Citations.Cited_Guidance: A masking is expected to be defined for at least two study roles in a study design with a double blind blinding schema.

rule.Description: A masking is expected to be defined for at least two study roles in a study design with a double blind blinding schema.

Outcome.Message: The study design has a double blind blinding schema (code=C15228) but there are not at least two applicable study roles that are masked.
